comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: NYT of January 11, 1916 select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F20713FC3B5B1773... reported the marriage of "musical comedy prima donna" Ferne Rogers to a Harold Detmold Robert.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: There are two dates on the photo: 1/12/16 (on the sticker) and 1(?)/16/26 (reverse). In 1916 she married Harold Detmold Robert (see also more extensive article about her with photos in The Washington herald., February 13, 1916, Image 28. She was American, buth her husband was German, and when she expressed her sympathies with the Germans, she was expelled from the Drury Lane theater in London.) In 1926, she married a Roy Bowman, who pretended to be a millionaire, but turned out to be a bath house rubber (The Milwaukee Sentinel - 27. Nov. 1926, with photo)

comment.author: 33593953@N02
comment._content: swanq and B-59: Thanks for the information and background details, which help explain the multiple dates and names on the image. We can add information when we next update the description.
